name: Magic Mushrooms
description:
Magic Mushrooms is a platform game that contains nine single screen levels. In each level the objective for the character known as Murphy is to collect all the magic mushrooms that are scattered around while avoiding the deadly monsters. Once all have been taken a chequered flag appeasr which has to be reached before time runs out. Contact with monsters or falling from heights leads to lives being lost. Controls are limited to moving left and right and jumping. Escalators and slides are used to move vertically while conveyor belts transport Murphy horizontally. Other level features include slippery ice, wobbly blocks, trampolines and blocks that collapse when walked over.

The game has a built-in editor that allows the player to create new levels or alter the ones that are already included.
